---
description: "GitHub Copilot instructions for this repository"
---

## Language site

**Content site:**This repository is primarily written in Spanish. When generating content, please use Spanish as the default language.
**Code comments and documentation:** When adding comments or documentation within the code, please use English to ensure clarity for a broader audience.

## Theme

This repository uses the [DaisyUI](https://daisyui.com/) plugin for Tailwind CSS to provide theming capabilities. The default theme is set to "retro" customized with specific color values.

Always use `/src/styles/global.css` to edit or add new components or pages styles.
Never use colors example: text-red-500 or bg-blue-200, instead use DaisyUI color classes like: //bg-base-100 or text-base-content.
